topic.title: Illustrative computations and presentation

p.i: Extracts from statements of financial position and statements of comprehensive income are provided to show the effects on these financial statements of the transactions described below. These extracts do not necessarily conform with all the disclosure and presentation requirements of other Standards.

body.p: All the examples below assume that the entities concerned have no transaction other than those described.
